Author: akatsuki_no_bun
Text: Orthorexia is newer (well it isn’t but the word is comparatively new), so resources can be hard to find. My therapist and I ended up trying this thing she usually does with OSFED peeps, where she had me rank foods that I didn’t eat from “most willing to try” to “maybe” to “omfg heck no!” And then we worked through the list slowly over several months. It’s honestly still a work in progress, but it helped me be less rigid/ grains are back on the table so yay?
